title: dhanyuDevvaDO
sahitya:
dhanyuDevvaDO dAsharathE 

(dhanyuDevvaDO)



anupallavi



anyamandu cittamuniyyaka brahmAnanda pAnamu jEsE

(dhanyuDevvaDO)



caraNam



vara maddaLa tALAdi tambUra vINa vAdyamula jErchukoni

svara sundaramutO sukhamu shrI varada venkatEshvaruni bhajincE

(dhanyuDevvaDO)
